Today, the Senate confirmed Julius Ness Richardson to be a lifetime U.S. circuit court judge

So? It means that now, 1 out of every 7 circuit court seats is now filled by a judge nominated by Trump.

html: Votes Scheduled: At 2:30pm on Wednesday, July 25th, the Senate will proceed to 2 votes in relation to the following amendments in relation to H.R.6147, Minibus Appropriations: 1. Moran #3433 2. Udall #3414
text:
Votes Scheduled: At 2:30pm on Wednesday, July 25th, the Senate will proceed to 2 votes in relation to the following amendments in relation to H.R.6147, Minibus Appropriations:
